name: MASTERPIECE CAKESHOP, LTD., et al., petitioners, v. COLORADO CIVIL RIGHTS COMMISSION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Masterpiece Cakeshop, Ltd. v. Colo. Civil Rights Comm'n

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
MASTERPIECE CAKESHOP, LTD., et al., petitioners,
v.
COLORADO CIVIL RIGHTS COMMISSION, et al.
attorneys: Joint motion of respondents for divided argument granted. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
casebody.head_matter:
MASTERPIECE CAKESHOP, LTD., et al., petitioners,
v.
COLORADO CIVIL RIGHTS COMMISSION, et al.
No. 16-111.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 21, 2017.
Joint motion of respondents for divided argument granted. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
